text_day_one-default.text: A NEW MOON WAS DISCOVERED BY THE PLANETARY DEFENCE DEPARTMENT. IT HAS BEEN GIVEN A NAME: CALAMITAS
CALAMITAS IS ON A COLLISION COURSE FOR YOUR PLANET, AND IMPACT WILL OCCUR IN LESS THAN THREE DAYS
YOU HAVE THAT MUCH TIME TO STOP CALAMITAS FROM COLLIDING
APPROACH THE SCIENTIST AND LEFT CLICK ON HIM TO INTERACT. PRESS “Z” TO ADVANCE DIALOGUE
